title.rendered: GREEN IS THE COLOR OF SUMMER

content.rendered:
GREEN IS THE COLOR OF SUMMER

The official color of Summer is green especially if it’s a rich apple or grass green. This color can be worn in so many different ways from a green dress to an all white look with green accessories or green shoes. 

You can also spice up your look with just a bright green handbag like that Bottega Veneta bag with an all black look like straight leg black jeans and menswear loose fitted black button down shirt or black blazer.

And another fun way to wear green is these super soft Bottega Veneta slippers that can be worn outside or on your vacation.

Both bags and shoes are from Bottega Veneta. Both looks are from FRWD.com. Earrings are from Valentino Garavani .

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Love Dionne,
